channel.title: WinZip sucks =[
channel.description:
Hi guys, I had WinZip because for some reason my winrar wouldn't open .zip files, so I've been using it and thanks to it I couldn't do anything with sources... Now I've realized that instead of having folders, winzip puts all the normals files together and on the side says the directory... Wow that was such a waste of time... So I uninstalled my winzip, and opened a .zip file with winrar, now it shows the folders and my files run correctly....
Just a little story of WinZip the failure program... :/ Sorry I just got mad for the time I was wasting looking for a "working" source when they all worked the whole time...

item.dc:creator: @killax killax
